= Introduction =

Gfuzzy is a python library used for creating a [[fuzzy-logic|http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fuzzy_logic]] inference engine. 


= Details =

Multiple sets and operations are available:


== Sets ==
- Rectangle
- Triangle
- Trapezoid

== Operations ==
- And
- Or
- Multiplication
- Addition
